items.sentence: Tom told me he doesn't want to do that again.
Tom told me he's uncertain what he should do.
Tom told me he's seen that movie three times.
Tom told me he'd like to become a bus driver.
Tom visited not only Boston but also Chicago.
Which of these suitcases are Tom's and yours?
Tom's garage is full of things he never uses.
Tom will be going out with Mary this evening.
Tom was sent to the principal's office today.
What do you plan on buying Tom for Christmas?
Tom's parents let Tom stay out late at night.
Tom's doctor advised Tom to give up drinking.
I thought that only happened to other people.
Even Tom said that he didn't want to do that.
He often attributes his failures to bad luck.
If you need a ride, I could come and get you.
It's about time for us to have another party.
A lot of people in our neighborhood own guns.
This type of thing never used to happen here.
It's so noisy here I can't hear myself think.
